required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of FTP-198 in Healthy Australian Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A 2-part, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Single and Multiple Ascending Doses of FTP-198 in Healthy Volunteers

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd

brief_summary.textblock: This is a first-in-human, Phase I, single-dose escalation and multiple-dose escalation clinical trial for FTP-198 conducted in Australian healthy volunteers. The safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of FTP-198 suspension in healthy volunteers will be evaluated using a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial design.

primary_outcome.measure: The number and severity of treatment emergent adverse events (TEAEs)
primary_outcome.description: To assess the safety and tolerability of single and multiple ascending oral doses of FTP-198 in healthy Australian subjects

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration
within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration
secondary_outcome.description: area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 48 hours after administration

secondary_outcome.measure: The level of changes of pharmacodynamic biomarkers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 0.5 hours before administration until 24 hours (single dose) or 48 hours (multiple doses) after administration
secondary_outcome.description: The change-from-baseline values of plasma lysophosphatidic acid (LPA) as PD biomarkers

intervention.description: Single dose of FTP-198, 6 dose levels, oral suspension
Placebo matched to FTP-198, oral suspension
Multiple doses of FTP-198, 3 dose levels, oral suspension, 7 days
Placebo matched to FTP-198, oral suspension, 7 days
